name: Zombie Head Hoops Basketball Skill Shot Training
name_original: Zombie Head Hoops Basketball Skill Shot Training
description:
Welcome to Zombie Basketball! This is how the Zombies do it! Pick up a zombie head and throw it through the hoop! 6 different zombie hoop themes to choose from. See how many zombie heads you can shoot through the basketball hoop with three different shooting modes!

> 6 Different Themes! Graveyard, Dead Lake, Doodle Ghost, R.I.P. Zombies, Gothic Arena, Dead Out There
> Featured Modes: Classic, 3 Point, and Progressive
> Universal for iPhone and iPad
> Fun Zombie Graphics!

Get it now for FREE!
